verbs.description: [ARG1: pets broward event] [V: aimed] [ARG2: at fighting pet overpopulation pets broward inaugural event] brought owners and their four - legged friends out to markham park in sunrise to support its mission of getting pet overpopulation under control our support base is broward county animal care jessica flores pet broward sheriffs office markham park tropicanine disc club of south florida scott fishman betty saylor broward broward county florida meredith bruder
